original_text:
VOMITING ALONE
**INSTITUTION
Discharge Summary
Name :
**NAME[AAA , BBB]
Acct # :
**ID-NUM
MRN :
**ID-NUM
Admitted :
**DATE[Jun 31 2007]
Discharged :
**DATE[Jul 03 2007]
Dict :
**NAME[XXX , WWW]
Attend :
**NAME[ZZZ , YYY]
SUMMARY OF STAY :
Mr. **NAME[AAA] is a **AGE[in 40s]- year - old Caucasian male with nonsmall - cell lung cancer which was diagnosed in 2005 .
He has metastatic disease and is status post chemotherapy and external beam radiation as well as whole - brain radiation .
He was admitted to the hospital on **DATE[Jun 3 2007] , with a fever of 38.1 .
He is known to have widely metastatic disease .
We were contacted on **DATE[Jun 31 2007] , in consult for abdominal pain .
He was found to have a marked dilated and thick - walled appendix with surrounding inflammation and fat stranding on CT scan .
He was taken to the operating room on **DATE[Jun 31 2007] , with Dr. **NAME[VVV] , who performed a laparoscopic appendectomy .
Please refer to the operative report for full outline of the details .
He tolerated the operative procedure well and was discharged to home on **DATE[Jul 3 2007] .
DIET :
Diet as tolerated .
ACTIVITY :
He is not to lift more than 10 pounds .
He should call for any bleeding or opening of his port sites or any signs of inflammation .
MEDICATIONS :
He is to resume his home medications .
FOLLOWUP :
He should follow up with his medical oncologist and radiation oncologist as scheduled .
He should see Dr. **NAME[VVV] in 2 weeks for followup ; the phone number is **PHONE .
He should call to arrange the appointment .
He should also contact his PCP to schedule followup .
______________________________
**NAME[WWW XXX] , CRNP
HS Job # 168463 / 37383 / 36132
SHY # **ID-NUM
D :
**DATE[Aug 13 2007] 13:41
T :
**DATE[Aug 14 2007] 09:26
**CARBON-COPY
